name: Battlefield 3 EA UK Forums
additional_info:
Current version: 1.2
--------------------------------------
Credits go DICE/EA for particular image references, and bladefinor for the coding and editing part.


Changelog:

Version 1.2
- Reuploaded the background as ImageShack resized it for some reason.

Version 1.1
- Fixed a work-around for quick-reply. White text color has been applied, but the background remains.
- Removed round corners for Firefox users (had some ugly appearance at certain places).
- Brightened the black transparent boxes with a dark blue-grey tint.
